title: RepEquity Named One of Washingtonian’s 50 Great Places to Work
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/26/2015 @ 9:07 AM Companies mentioned in this article: RepEquity 
WASHINGTON -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- RepEquity , a leader in digital brand experience, marketing and reputation, today announced that it was recognized by Washingtonian Magazine as one of the 50 Great Places to Work in the Washington, D.C. area. Announced every two years, the winning workplaces are chosen after reviewing hundreds of companies and 10,000 employee surveys. 
“Over the past year, we have grown our staff by 76%, which makes this award even more meaningful since we have been able to maintain our positive company culture while adding new talent,” said Tripp Donnelly, RepEquity’s CEO and founder. “We take great pride in the work we do and embrace a company culture that celebrates every employee’s individual contribution and talent.” 
The 50 winning workplaces were chosen on the basis of factors such as: challenging and interesting work, great work/life balance, generous pay and benefits, opportunities to learn and grow, commitment to charity and community, and the recognition and respect given to employees. 
“RepEquity is a great company because of its employees, and we work hard to create an environment that nurtures creativity and rewards initiative,” Donnelly said. “The result is a team that is passionate about our client’s success, dedicated to quality work and building a great company. As a native Washingtonian, I am proud we’ve been able to attract and retain such great talent in this great city.” 
Receiving the distinction as a Washingtonian Great Place to Work rounds out an excellent year for RepEquity. The company has expanded with offices and employees in Washington, D.C., New York City, Boston, and San Francisco. In May, the company was among the top companies on Washington Business Journal’s Best Places to Work 2015 list. More recently, the fast-growing company announced its acquisition of Unison, an award-winning mobile experience company, and the launch of its new joint venture Momentum Advocacy with the Business-Industry Political Action Committee (BIPAC) designed to power national and international advocacy campaigns for hundreds of America’s largest companies and trade associations. 
For information about jobs at RepEquity, visit www.repequity.com/careers . 
About RepEquity 
RepEquity is a leader in digital brand experience, marketing, and reputation. We deliver technology and business solutions that transform the way brands are defined, connected, and protected. RepEquity serves global brands and leaders in business, entertainment, technology, government, retail and finance. Among many awards in its history, RepEquity has been named to the INC. 500 and Deloitte’s Fast 500 as one of the fastest growing companies in America. For more information, visit RepEquity.com .
